SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RECNUM , t.* FROM (SELECT a.GOODS_ID , a.GOODS_TITLE , a.GOODS_MANUFACTURER , a.GOODS_SALES_PRICE , TO_CHAR(a.GOODS_ENTER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GOODS_ENTER_DATE , TO_CHAR(a.GOODS_PRODUCTION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GOODS_PRODUCTION_DATE , b.goods_size , b.goods_qty , b.goods_color FROM GOODS a, goods_detail b where a.goods_id = b.goods_id and TO_CHAR(a.GOODS_ENTER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #{beginDate} and #{endDate}
AND a.GOODS_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%'
AND a.GOODS_ID LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%'
AND a.GOODS_MANUFACTURER LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%'
ORDER BY a.GOODS_ENTER_DATE DESC)t) WHERE RECNUM BETWEEN (#{section}-1)*100 + (#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 AND (#{section}-1)*100 + (#{pageNum})*10

SELECT G.* , TO_CHAR(G.GOODS_PRODUCTION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GOODS_PRODUCTION_DATE , I.FILENAME , D.GOODS_SIZE , D.GOODS_COLOR , D.GOODS_QTY , D.goods_size , D.goods_qty , D.goods_color FROM GOODS G, GOODS_IMAGE I, GOODS_DETAIL D WHERE G.GOODS_ID=I.GOODS_ID AND G.GOODS_ID=D.GOODS_ID AND I.FILETYPE='main_image' AND G.GOODS_ID=#{goods_id} and D.goods_size=#{goods_size} ORDER BY G.GOODS_ID
SELECT * FROM GOODS_IMAGE WHERE GOODS_ID=#{goods_id} ORDER BY IMAGE_ID ASC
